comment: Professor Whitlock is an amazing professor. She's understanding and really cares for her students. Class is always interesting and never boring. She speaks her mind but never tells a student their optinion is wrong. She's worth taking if you ever have the chance too. One of the best KSU has to offer. I slacked off a good bit but still made an A
This class is not for the uber conservative or the closed minded. Dr. Whitlock is an amazing professor, and I learned a lot from her. Take her if you can!
Engaging, humorous professor - impossible to fall asleep in her class. I only wish the course was LONGER! Highly recommended.

Queer Theory & Sexuality.  This was the most interesting class I have had at KSU.  I took this class to fulfill upper level requirement. I was pleased w/my selection.  Dr. Whitlock is engaging and well versed.  I would definitely recommend her and this class.  It's a real eye opener to our ignorance & understanding of the LGBTQ community.
Take Dr. Whitlock!  She is funny and very passionate about this course.  She is knowledgeable and helpful.  Her lectures are entertaining- you will not want to miss class.
We learned about a little bit of everything. i learned some interesting things. writing the paper part is what got me, i hate writing.

I took her a long time ago and forgot to rate. She is honestly a breathe of fresh air in a drowning sea. Very unique and entertaining. Just needs to be a little more open to ideas that are not her own.

Dr. Whitlock is nice, but very unorganized. You will learn enough. But you will only learn about white queer culture. we were supposed to discuss a lot of things but we never did. we read books that we scarcely talked about in class. Really it's an easy A; which is what I got. But i wanted to learn.truly I did not.i suggest doing your own studying.

I took Queer pop culture with her and it was a really great class. As someone mentioned earlier, she does deviate from the syllabus, but she is incredibly flexible with due dates because of this. All she asks is that she gets quality work in return. I'd recommend her in a heartbeat.

Dr.Whitlock is a really nice lady. However, she changes the schedule so much through the semester that it can get really frustrating at times. I have taken two of her courses and she did this in both of them. It gets really confusing and makes for a lot of chaos in the class.
Very stimulating professor- teaches great queer theory classes.

Fantastic! Dr. Whitlock is brilliant. Her Ed background shines - she's all about figuring out how to get people engaged and using their minds. She'll challenge you but you'll learn a lot if your ears are open. She has a real talent for handling tough issues in an unbiased and caring way and paying attention to ALL the diverse people in the room.
Dr. Whitlock is a great professor. I took Queer Theory with her and she made the class a lot of fun. She made the class very informative too, and we learned so much. I highly recommend her.
Dr. Whitlock is one of the best of the best!  She makes learning fun.  Her tests are multiple choice and scenarios and may be subject to be open book.  You will learn a lot from Dr. Whitlock!

Ms. Whitlock is one of the best teachers I have ever had. Her class is fun and she is very helpful. It is alot of work, but she makes it both fun and interesting, and she doesn't grade hard. There are lots of group presentations and class discussions, so don't take it if you are afraid to speak up!
